thread.title: Donald Trump accidentally tweets at random woman rather than his own daughter
thread.title_full: Donald Trump accidentally tweets at random woman rather than his own daughter

author: Joseph Earp
title: Donald Trump accidentally tweets at random woman rather than his own daughter
text:
President-elect of the United States, Donald J. Trump sure loves getting compliments.
He loves them so much that if you send him one over Twitter, he might even retweet or Quote: it.
SEE ALSO: Don's Johns: Port-a-potties get censored for Trump‚Äôs inauguration
That's what happened when Twitter user Lawrence Goodstein set out to praise Trump's daughter Ivanka, calling her a "woman with real character and class."
Only thing is, he tagged the wrong Ivanka ‚Äî a mistake Trump himself didn't notice when he Quote: d Goodstein's words.
" @drgoodspine : @realDonaldTrump @Ivanka Trump is great, a woman with real character and class."
‚Äî Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 17, 2017
Instead of tweeting at his daughter (for future reference she's @IvankaTrump, Donald) he tweeted at a young woman living in the UK named Ivanka Majic.
In a few hours time a lady called Ivanka in South East England will wake to find Donald Trump has been showering her with praise pic.twitter.com/yqC70DbiV1
‚Äî Chris üêî (@Lukeurmyson) January 17, 2017
It's an embarrassing mistake, not least of all because from the look of her Tweets, Majic isn't exactly a fan of the Don.
@TheDumberTrump @realDonaldTrump @TrumpPence @TRUMPREAGAN @GOP @usa @mcspocky Don't know about you but I'm voting for @HillaryClinton
‚Äî Ivanka Majic (@ivanka) October 26, 2016
As you might imagine, this isn't the first time that poor Majic has been muddled up in the Trump saga. Though admittedly this is the first time Trump himself has become involved.
Busy busy Twitter notifications. I wonder if I could put this to some good? #iwishihadavote pic.twitter.com/KzlBtxISQc
‚Äî Ivanka Majic (@ivanka) August 4, 2016
I might have to retire my twitter account. Not sure what's worse, the abuse or the congratulations.
‚Äî Ivanka Majic (@ivanka) November 10, 2016
Unsurprisingly, the internet at large is giving Donald a bit of a roasting for his daughter versus random woman mix-up.
How do you not know your own daughter's twitter handle. I mean Tiffany sure, but Ivanka? IVANKA?! https://t.co/mkTaZ3rQ1z
‚Äî Tommy Campbell (@MrTommyCampbell) January 17, 2017
That isn't your daughter's twitter handle, Nitwit https://t.co/s3RpUv0XxF
‚Äî Keith Olbermann (@KeithOlbermann) January 17, 2017
#PEOTUS just tagged the wrong Ivanka and still hasn't corrected the tweet. He can't even tweet @ his own daughter. Sad! #Ivanka https://t.co/Sz7j06uEmv
‚Äî Dem Texas Girls (@TexDem16) January 17, 2017
Oh well. It's not like Trump's oversights will soon have profound international importance or anything.
BONUS: In stunning exchange, Trump refuses to answer question from CNN reporter
